name: Wellington Jiang
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Wellington is a junior studying ECE with a minor in math. Within AB Tech, he is interested in sound, rigging and driving trucks and golf carts. In his free time, Wellington likes to take photos, blast music, read, and sleep with vicious intent.

name: Heidi Tao
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Heidi is a junior majoring in Information Systems with a minor in Engineering Studies. She enjoys capturing moments with photos and videos. FUNFACT her name is pronounced as "Hiiiii" followed by a "D" :D

name: Maggie Gong
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Maggie is a winter sport lover who enjoys touching grass and firmly believes that mayo and ketchup should go on burgers.

name: Max Wang
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Max is a sophomore in ABTech interested in (but not good at!) lighting, sound, stage management and media. In his free time, he enjoys playing video games, watching anime and staying in his room.

name: Mia Kong
title: Co-Finance Chair
desc: Mia is a junior in Mechanical Engineering. In her free time, she likes to read as well as cook, especially when it comes to trying out new recipes. A fun fact about her is that she has three blahajs!

name: Vi Vu
title: Co-Finance Chair
desc: Vi is a sophomore studying computer science. In my free time, she likes to listen to a random assortment of music, play video games, build keyboards, and fall into rabbit holes.

name: Fletcher Sun
title: Equipment Manager
desc: Fletcher is a sophomore studying StatsML and IRP. In tech, he mainly does lighting, and is a fan of a certain fixture that start with B and end with E. In his spare time, he likes playing and watching soccer(occasionally during tech too), going down random wikipedia pages, blasting J-pop/musicals/military marches, and sleep.

name: Chloe Poon
title: Personnel Manager
desc: Chloe is a sophomore majoring in ECE and BME. In her free time she likes to sleep, eat, stare into space, and crochet. Her favorite tech memory is sleeping on Percival during KPDS week and the random Wushiland boba trips. Fun fact: Chloe’s andrew id is cpoon2.

name: Niki Wang
title: Internal Operations Chair
desc: Niki will be studying Cognitive Science and in my free time she likes reading (literally anything interesting) and listening to K-pop. Niki’s favorite tech memory is blasting K-pop on our KPDC sound system after the show.

name: Shannon Lee
title: Social Chair
desc: Shannon is a sophomore studying art and film with a minor in animation and special effects. In her free time, she enjoys going to museums and finding everything bagels with jalapeno cream cheese.

name: Tucker Shea
title: Tracker Dev
desc: Tucker is a sophomore studying Electrical and Computer Engineering. He especially enjoys Media-ing and TiCing, love to hike, and can often be found in a hammock outside KT. His favorite moments are story time with techies and tech alums.

name: Gyan Singh
title: Repair & Maintenance Chair
desc: Gyan is a sophomore studying ECE. She mainly does lighting design in AB Tech but enjoys dabbling in sound and production management. In her free time, you can find her making art, doing any variety of outdoorsy activities, or perched on the tallest surface in the room.

name: Percival
title: Mascot
desc: Percival is our favorite and fluffiest techie! With over 2 decades of knowledge, it enjoys being a vital member in all lighting and sound events. Whether it's for moral support or late-night contemplation, Percival is here for all of us, all the time ʕっ•ᴥ•ʔっ
